org.apache.ignite.lang

Interface IgniteAsyncSupport

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IgniteCache<K,V>, IgniteCluster, IgniteCompute, IgniteEvents, IgniteFileSystem, IgniteMessaging, IgniteServices, Transaction

    public interface IgniteAsyncSupport
    Allows to enable asynchronous mode on Ignite APIs.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <R> IgniteFuture<R> future()
      Gets and resets future for previous asynchronous operation.
      boolean isAsync() 
      IgniteAsyncSupport withAsync()
      Gets instance of this component with asynchronous mode enabled.

    • Method Detail

      • withAsync

        IgniteAsyncSupport withAsync()
        Gets instance of this component with asynchronous mode enabled.
        Returns:
        Instance of this component with asynchronous mode enabled.

      • isAsync

        boolean isAsync()
        Returns:
        True if asynchronous mode is enabled.

      • future

        <R> IgniteFuture<R> future()
        Gets and resets future for previous asynchronous operation.
        Returns:
        Future for previous asynchronous operation.
